constraints.name: longest_increasing_subsequence
constraints.description: 最长递增子序列的长度至少为 n-1

constraints.name: permutation_constraint
constraints.description: 排列必须是 1 到 n 的一个全排列
constraints.formal: A is a permutation of [1, 2, ..., n]

constraints.name: bubble_sort_passes
constraints.description: 经过 k 次冒泡排序后，排列应满足几乎有序的条件
constraints.formal: After k passes of bubble sort, LIS(A) >= n - 1
